text: hamane unhen un cheezon mein jamaav aur saamarthy pradaan kee thee, jinamen tumhen jamaav aur saamarthy nahin pradaan kee. aur hamane unhen kaan, aankhen aur dil die the. kintu na to unake kaan unake kuchh kaam aae aur na unakee aankhe aur na unake dil hee. kyonki ve allaah kee aayaton ka inakaar karate the aur jis cheez kee ve hansee udaate the, usee ne unhen aa ghera
